snippet: Justice Wallace Jefferson of State Supreme Court called for a commission to investigate wrongful convictions, noting that Texas leads the nation in prisoners set free by DNA testing.
abstract: Justice Wallace Jefferson of Texas State Supreme Court calls for commission to investigate wrongful convictions, noting that state leads nation in prisoners set free by DNA testing.
lead_paragraph: Justice Wallace Jefferson of State Supreme Court called for a commission to investigate wrongful convictions, noting that Texas leads the nation in prisoners set free by DNA testing.

headline.main: Texas: Justice Seeks Inquiry Into Wrongful Convictions
headline.print_headline: Texas: Justice Seeks Inquiry Into Wrongful Convictions
